overview: This was the first time we had worked with Charley Chase, and who knew? This natural busty Latina is also an unbelievable squirter: There's no way to fake that kind of fountainous squirting. Add Hunter Bryce, India Summer, Ashli Orion and Amber Rayne to the mix (all REAL squirters) and the result is an all-out splash-fest!
title: Squirtatious
